definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)

sentences.english: Gain upper-body strength by developing a consistent workout routine.
sentences.chinese: 增益上肢力量通過制定一致的常規訓練。

sentences.english: Objective To study a new method of treatment for upper limb lymphedema after radical mastectomy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討乳腺癌術後上肢淋巴水腫的治療方法。

sentences.english: Beginning with either your right or left arm, slowly lower your arm back toward your head.
sentences.chinese: 開始先將右側或左側上肢緩慢地向後朝頭部放低。

sentences.english: Laundry pole with both hands placed across the shoulder, arm twisting around.
sentences.chinese: 雙手將晾衣竿橫放在肩後，左右扭動上肢。

sentences.english: The application of orthosis and self-help aids to hemiplegic upper extremity was summarized.
sentences.chinese: 對中風後偏癱上肢應用矯形器和自助具進行了綜述。

sentences.english: Neck and shoulder pain is the most common upper-extremity musculoskeletal problem among computer users.
sentences.chinese: 頸部和肩部疼痛是計算機用戶最常見的上肢肌骨問題。

sentences.english: The chief artery to the upper limb is the subclavian artery .
sentences.chinese: 鎖骨下動脈是到上肢的主要動脈。

sentences.english: Table 1 shows the Shef data for the United States and China.
sentences.chinese: 表1顯示上肢數據，對美國和中國。

sentences.english: The posture control of the rehabilitation robot for the human arm is investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了上肢康復機器人的姿態控制問題。

sentences.english: She reported no previous history of neck pain or upper-extremity radicular symptoms.
sentences.chinese: 患者自訴既往無頸痛或上肢的神經根症狀。

sentences.english: She had decreased hearing in her left ear, upper extremity tingling and numbness.
sentences.chinese: 她的左耳聽力下降，上肢刺痛和麻木。

definition: triceps brachii (back of the upper arm)
the four limbs of the body
serratus anterior muscle (upper sides of the chest)
